name: Baby Witch
description:
Bubble Witch Shooter Match 3 game. Welcome to my wingdom !!!

Experience the thrill of bubble shooting with endless witchy surprises. Help Witch Stella to rescue sweet monsters trapped inside bubbles. Unlock new characters, new levels as you travel through wingdom in this juicing bubble shooting match 3 adventure. Game is easy to play, yet difficult to master.

Can you help sweet little baby witch to pop bubbles and rescue sweet cherry monsters? Plan your every pop to rescue baby monsters! Strategically burst matching bubbles to help baby witch collects the cute monsters in her basket ! Work your way through increasingly challenging levels and employ the power of the elements to help you in your Baby witch quest. Bubble-bursting powerups will help you free the monsters Combine them for even greater effect! Welcome to sweet baby witch magic !!!!

FEATURES:
-- 1000+ levels with uniquely challenging obstacles
-- More levels added every two weeks
-- Stunning graphics & adorable animations
-- Addicting pace & rewarding progression
-- Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
-- Achievements with lots of XPs.
-- Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
-- Free & easy to play, challenging to master
-- Available to play on mobile and tablet devices
